{{cpp/string/char_traits/title|to_char_type}}
{{cpp/string/char_traits/navbar}}
{{ddcl|notes={{mark constexpr since c++11}}&lt;br&gt;{{mark noexcept since c++11}}|
static char_type to_char_type( int_type c );
}}

Converts {{c|c}} to {{tt|char_type}}. If there is no equivalent {{tt|char_type}} value (such as when {{c|c}} is a copy of the {{rlpf|eof}} value), the result is unspecified.

See {{named req|CharTraits}} for the general requirements on character traits for {{tt|X::to_char_type}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|c|value to convert}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
A value equivalent to {{c|c}}.

===Complexity===
Constant.
